title: Riot please..i ask only one thing.
body:
There is only one thing i want right now. it should be a fairly easy thing to do and it would make my league experience ALOT more enjoyable...

GIVE US BACK ITEM SETS.

I myself and know of other people who loved this feature and are wondering right now why it is not a part of the new client.
I remember being done with LoL for the day and then spending another hour or so adjusting my builds and trying out new things.
Yes ofc i know what items i should buy on champions but simply having all the items your champion should be focusing organized to your liking on 1 page makes it SO MUCH easier. 
Not to mention it also saves some time. i even got late to a fight bc i was in a hurry and couldnt type "randuins" in time.

I honestly dont get why this feature was removed but i would LOVE to get it back.
If they removed it bc they thought people didnt use it i cant say i agree with that decision, if people dont like it they simply wont use it and they'll probably wont care about it either so why remove it for us who did use the feature?

Is there anyone who agree's with me or am i just the only one bothered by this?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: You obviously don`t pay attention to riots announcments or else you would know they are already coming back.
You sir. Just made my day :)
